values.description: API base URL for Article microservice (direct backend via Nginx+PHP-FPM)
APISIX API Gateway base URL (root, used for health checks)
APISIX API Gateway - V1 API (Article endpoints)
APISIX API Gateway - V2 API (Article + User endpoints)
Direct backend URL port 8080 (Nginx + PHP-FPM runtime)
Direct backend URL port 8081 (RoadRunner runtime)
Direct backend URL port 8082 (FrankenPHP runtime)
Valid JWT token for APISIX authentication (RS256, key: article-api-key, exp: 2026-01-15). Regenerate using /tmp/gen_fresh_jwt.sh or apisix/jwt-keys/private.pem
JWT consumer key matching APISIX jwt-auth plugin configuration
Expired JWT token for negative testing (exp: 2020-09-13). Used to verify 401 Unauthorized responses
Default event ID for article creation. Must reference existing event in database
Default title for creating article (used when test_title not auto-generated)

values.value: A brief summary of the exciting new feature that has just been released.
values.description: Default short description for creating article. Must be 50+ characters

values.value: This is the full article content describing the new feature in detail. It includes all the relevant information about what was released, how it works, and what benefits it provides to users.
values.description: Default full description for creating article. Must be 50-50000 characters
Updated title for PUT /article/{uuid} requests

values.value: Updated summary with additional details about the feature enhancement.
values.description: Updated short description for PUT requests. Must be 50+ characters

values.value: Updated full content with comprehensive information about the feature enhancement and its improvements.
values.description: Updated full description for PUT requests. Must be 50-50000 characters
Status filter for search queries. Valid values: draft, published, archived
AUTO-POPULATED: Generated in pre-request scripts with timestamp for uniqueness. Format: 'APISIX Test Article {timestamp}'
AUTO-POPULATED: Generated in pre-request scripts. Format: 'apisix-test-article-{timestamp}'. Used for unique article creation
AUTO-POPULATED: Extracted from POST/GET response data.uuid. Used for subsequent CRUD operations on the same article item
AUTO-POPULATED: Extracted from response data.slug. Used for GET /article/slug/{slug} endpoint
AUTO-POPULATED: UUID specifically for workflow lifecycle tests (create→publish→unpublish→archive→delete). Extracted from Create response
AUTO-POPULATED: Slug for workflow tests. Extracted from Create response data.slug
AUTO-POPULATED: Extracted from User API response. Used for GET/PUT/DELETE /users/{uuid} operations
Default email for user creation via POST /users/
Default username for user creation via POST /users/
Default first name for user creation and profile updates
Default last name for user creation and profile updates
New password for PUT /users/{uuid}/password endpoint
New email for PUT /users/{uuid}/email endpoint
AUTO-POPULATED: Refresh token hash from JWT issue response. Used for POST /jwt/refresh endpoint
